content.title: MMKY-Financial Assistance for New Boat, Engine, and Net
content.details: The State plan scheme “MMKY-Financial Assistance for New Boat, Engine, and Net” was launched by the Fisheries & Animal Resources Development Department, Government of Odisha under Mukhyamantri Maschyajibi Kalyan Yojana (MMKY) in order to increase the marine fish production and to enhance incomes and livelihoods of the marine fishers.
benefits: Support for Coastal communities by provision of new wooden/FRP Boat, Engine and purchase of new fishing net.
Increase in marine fish production in the state.
Increase in income and improvement of welfare of coastal communities in the State.
eligibility: The beneficiary should be a resident of Odisha and must possess identity and residential proof including an Aadhaar Card.
The beneficiary should have a Bank Account in his/her name in the State of Odisha.
The beneficiary should have QR Coded Aadhaar Card.
The beneficiary should not have received any financial assistance from Government /any Agency towards the purchase of any new boat/engine in the last 5 Years and net in the last 3 Years.
One beneficiary family should not be provided with multiple benefits under one particular scheme.
content.application_process: Online and Offline. Registration through Go-Sugam Portal is required.
documents_required: A copy of the Photo ID Card
A copy of the Caste/category certificate, if applicable
A copy of the QR Aadhaar card
Any other relevant documents, as required

faqs.question: What is 'MMKY-Financial Assistance for New Boat, Engine, and Net' Scheme?
faqs.answer: The MMKY-Financial Assistance for New Boat, Engine, and Net Scheme is a part of the Mukhyamantri Maschyajibi Kalyan Yojana (MMKY) initiated by the Fisheries & Animal Resources Development Department, Government of Odisha.

faqs.question: Who implements the Scheme?
faqs.answer: The scheme shall be implemented by the Additional Fisheries Officers (Marine)/District Fisheries Officer (B&T), Balugaon for marine fishing in the coastal districts of Odisha.

faqs.question: Is the procurement of a fishing boat mandatory under the scheme?
faqs.answer: Yes, the procurement of a fishing boat is mandatory under the MMKY-Financial Assistance Scheme.

faqs.question: What is the subsidy percentage under the scheme?
faqs.answer: The back-ended subsidy is limited to 60% for SC/ST/Women/PWD/Transgender beneficiaries and 40% for the General category.
